definition: Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.english: I shall never forget the magnificence of the Swiss mountains and the beauty of the lakes.
sentences.chinese: 我永远也不会忘记瑞士山岳的壮美和湖泊的秀丽。

sentences.english: The Chinese tourist has become a ubiquitous sight from the Grand Canyon to the Grand Palais.
sentences.chinese: 从壮美的峡谷到宏伟的宫殿，中国到处都是旅游景点。

sentences.english: But this majestic interest cannot be felt by the people who doesn't have the powerful spirit.
sentences.chinese: 但这种壮美的趣味是非有雄健的精神的不能感觉到的。

sentences.english: The tolerance and the sublime of the seacoast stone hold's unique charm.
sentences.chinese: 大海的宽容与壮美的海岸石丰韵独具。

sentences.english: I spent a week capturing one of the biggest aurora borealis shows in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 我用了一周的时间拍下了近年来最壮美的一次极光。

sentences.english: Mount Emei Buddha is the most magnificent spectacle.
sentences.chinese: 佛光是峨眉山最壮美的奇观。

definition: nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
